aidAlAdha.title: Aid Al-Adha
aidAlAdha.subtitle: Celebrate Eid by sharing joy with families in Gaza. Choose to donate: Mutton for â‚¬250, a whole Veal for â‚¬1850, or 1/7 Veal for â‚¬260. Your gift helps provide sheep or calves for sacrifice, bringing warmth and happiness to those in need.

sosGaza.title: SOS Gaza
sosGaza.subtitle: The people of Gaza are enduring relentless bombardments and humanitarian distress. Your urgent support delivers food, medical aid, and essential supplies to families in desperate need.

zakatAlMaal.title: Zakat Al-Maal
zakatAlMaal.subtitle: Fulfill your obligation and uplift lives. Zakat Al-Maal, one of Islamâ€™s five pillars, requires giving 2.5% of savings exceeding the Nisab. Your Zakat funds critical relief efforts and sustainable aid projects.

rafahEmergency.title: Rafah Emergency
rafahEmergency.subtitle: Thousands have fled their homes in Rafah, seeking safety and shelter. Help us deliver emergency aid to displaced families in this critical time.

orphanSponsorship.title: Orphan Sponsorship
orphanSponsorship.subtitle: Make a lasting impact in a childâ€™s life. Sponsor an orphan to provide food, education, healthcare, and a sense of belonging.

waterForGaza.title: Water for Gaza
waterForGaza.subtitle: In Gaza, over 90% of tap water is undrinkable due to extreme salinity and pollution. Groundwater contamination exceeds 96%. Help us supply clean, safe waterâ€”an essential lifeline for countless families.
